content: collab with courtney shepherd aka @gothfaeriescreations 1 get her matching bunny lovey here 2 this blanket is a variation on the classic 6-day kid blanket 6dkb it was inspired by beautiful viral photos of 6-day kid blankets the original classic 6-day kid blanket was written for a toddler-sized blanket made with chunky weight yarn and can easily be made in six days if you wanted to make a different size blanket or use different yarn you would have to take my original pattern and make alterations this pattern gives exact instructions for a baby blanket made with dk weight yarn with the look and color choices you have all been asking me for i ve added my own special details - a straight start and squared off edge for a clean look symmetrical stripes and a camel stitch border with a simple but elegant edge please visit my website if you would like to purchase this pattern with graphs 3 1 https //www instagram com/gothfaeriescreations 2 https //www etsy com/listing/1035451679/bunny-lovey-crochet-pattern-pdf-download ref=search_recently_viewed-1 3 https //betty-mcknit myshopify com/products/copy-of-6-day-kid-blanket-viral-variation-with-graphs
